Author: Celeste Frye
Body:
Havent used it yet, nor do I know the most recommended cookbook. It’s nearly 3hrs old.
Looking for best cookbook to get for beginners and potentially best foods(meats, veggies) to try out in it first!
😊

Author: Krystle Clinton
Body: Was in a hurry to put my chicken on and apparently the the paper thing my chicken was on was still stuck to my chicken 🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️ did I just ruin all my chicken???

Author: Suzanne Lorette Davis
Body: If I’m doing pot in pot cooking, can my dish be above the Max Fill line? I’m stacking pan on top of pan, and it’s almost to the top.

Author: Linda Marietta Halverson
Body: 3.5 lb frozen solid Chuck roast. Wanting to cook in my 6 qt Duo. It barely fits without trivit. Is 90 min with NPR enough or do I need to increase time?

Author: Jill Selkowitz
Body:
I love this easy Chicken and Rice recipe. https://thisoldgal.com/instant-pot-chicken-and-rice/
Everything gets tossed in to the pot and in a few minutes a delicious meal is ready to serve.

Author: Sondra Nicholson
Body: This is my first time using this pot, I thought everything was out, now I’m wondering if this, whatever it is, got stuck on the bottom of the inside pot when I put it in. I got a burn notice, stopped it and found the burnt thing. How do I get it off or is my very expensive instant pot ruined?!!

Author: Olivia Vaughan
Body: This Instant Pot Pot Roast is a Sunday classic but it’s a great recipe for any day of the week and so easy to make! https://littlesunnykitchen.com/instant-pot-pot-roast/

Author: Sharry Johnson Porter
Body: Why does it keep saying burn food instead of cooking? It has liquid in it, I have restarted a few times and keeps saying it

Author: Jennifer Sisson
Body: Check this out. I just bought this huge bag of Arborio rice on Amazon ( I hope it’s good quality-IDK) Planning on making lots of risottos! Hit me up with your favorite risotto recipes in the IP. Tonight I’m making lamb chops and looking for a nice side risotto.

Author: Roe AP
Body:
Can anyone tell me how to convert this stovetop recipe to the Instant Pot?
https://jazzyvegetarian.com/root-veggie-and-lentil.../...

Author: Melissa Vicinanza Verified account
Body:
It’s a hot one today. We are staying in watching movies and making homemade tootsie rolls. Making them is just as fun as eating them.
https://www.sparklestosprinkles.com/instant-pot-tootsie.../

Author: Sharon Hall
Body: Help! I just poured a cup of water in my instant pot, not realizing I didn't have the insert in. Now it appears to be dead...no lights, nothing. I have an Instant Pot Max. Advice,, please.

Body: Dinner tonight 🍲😃

Author: Carla Bushey Verified account
Body:
Pasta carbonara in the instant pot!
https://www.adventuresofanurse.com/pasta-carbonara.../

Author: Angela Cardamone Campos
Body: I made this Instant Pot Banana Split Oatmeal for a special breakfast treat this morning. It was easy to make and so yummy! https://www.marathonsandmotivation.com/instant-pot.../

Author: Michael Schildt
Body: May not look like much but this was one of the most enjoyable meals I’ve had In awhile. Used Hillshire Farms Smoked Turkey Sausage, 5 minutes, npr, 1-1/2 cups of water plus the juice from the sauerkraut. I’ll be doing this again that’s for sure.

Author: Peg Behlmann Belaska
Body: I am still struggling with the concept of pip cooking. Why wouldn’t you do this all the time? It would prevent the burning issue and you could put more water in if you were concerned about the water evaporating. You would not need to worry about layering or stirring. Am i just not understanding this method?

Author: Felicia Raffaele
Body:
I love cooking, it's really soothing for me, and I love good homemade food. However, I'm really struggling processing something at the moment, and ended up eating unhealthy takeout, getting bloated and then hating myself for it, since Friday. 🙁
Are there any stupidly easy but comforting recipes you would recommend? Something you make when you need to cheer up a little? I'm having a really hard time making decisions right now. Thank you. 🥺❤️
